main.name: Dao Ngoc Hieu
main.bio: I am a Computer Science student at the National University of Singapore. I am also a software developer with experience in building websites and mobile applications.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computing in Computer Science
education.description: CAP: 4.86/5.0. Expect Honours with Highest Distinction

education.school: High School for Gifted Students - Hanoi National University, University of Education
education.description: Achieved a total score of 27.8/30 on the National University Entrance Exam

achievments.name: Award of Nancy Tan Siew Lan Bursary
achievments.title: Singapore

achievments.name: Second Prize in Science Olympiad at State Level

work.title: Computer Vision Engineer Intern
work.description: Create programs for calculating direction and velocity of underwater vehicles used in competitions such as SAUVC, RoboSub and RoboX.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Developed a dashboard website and a mobile applicationa and worked on both backend (PostgreSQL), frontend (React) and API (REST and GraphQL) for the company's application.

work.title: Student Tutor
work.description: Carried out labs and tutorials, graded assignments as well as provided weekly consultations for students taking CS1010 Programming Methodology.

projects.name: I'm the Best Coder, Shopee
projects.title: Team Freshie Frenzy
projects.description: Ranked 24/210. The first 50 teams are visible on the leaderboard. Implemented a program written in Python to detect frauds in selling posts. These frauds include fake reviews and descriptions.

projects.name: Hack&Roll 2020, NUS Hackers
projects.title: Team EliteVision
projects.description: Created a program that analysed CCTV footage to monitor traffic condition and detect illegal vehicles. The application also provides heatmap indicating places with dense amount of traffic and illegal vehicles.

projects.name: Build On, Singapore!, AWS Hackathon
projects.title: YeeHaw
projects.description: Qualified as a finalist team. Showed innovative ideas to solve the crowded bus problem in NUS. By using an application that formulate routes for students based on their schedule together with efficiently assign buses to crowded locations, the average waiting time for buses is significantly reduced.

projects.name: NUSocial Android Application
projects.title: Orbital 2020, School of Computing, NUS
projects.description: An Artemis-level project built under the Orbital progamme. It serves as a platform for academic and social life of NUS students with features such as Buddy Matching, Location-based Broadcasting and other social media features (posting, messaging). The app comes with a web admin for communities' admins to monitor activities.

projects.name: 3D Geometry Mobile Application (cross-platform)
projects.title: Personal Project
projects.description: A visualization tool for 3D geometry and modeling. The app allows users to create various shapes such as box, cone, sphere, octahedron, prism as well as custom shapes by connecting points. Users can also save created shapes and sync it with their online account. This app is built using Three.js and React Native.

testimonials.text: Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough
